swift.title: swift binary location
swift.description:
The location of the swift binary.
 
Default behaviour if this setting is left empty is to search for a command called `swift`, but you can specify an explicit path or different command here if required.

lldb.title: lldb binary location
lldb.description:
The location of the lldb binary.
 
Default behaviour if this setting is left empty is to search for a command called `lldb`, but you can specify an explicit path or different command here if required.
